[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Descent-header.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Descent-header” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

descent

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_text_color=”#D9C2A3″ header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Resilience and revelation in catastrophic times

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Saturday November 25, 2023

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_text_align=”center” header_4_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

PURCHASE THE RECORDING OF THIS EVENT

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_padding=”2px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”1080.4px” custom_padding=”53px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An online gathering in the Bone Cave

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This gathering was anchored around a visioning of Persephone’s cyclical descent to the Underworld and reemergence into the light. We walked alongside Persephone for a while; we sang over the bones of her story to reveal its wisdom and allow it to work its magic on us.

  • What kind of soul journey is required of us at a time when the world around us – social, political, environmental – is in crisis? What happens to us when we ‘fall out of myth’?
  • How can we hold ourselves together during these long, dark nights of the soul? How can we express our grief, without allowing it to paralyse us?
  • How can we prepare ourselves for a journey through dark times, and understand the lessons of the Underworld?
  • How can we thrive and transform in this place of mystery and uncertainty?
  • How can we learn to walk side by side with Death, and befriend her?
  • And, ultimately, how can we be reborn – how can we shapeshift into a form that enables us to bring back our own unique song as a healing gift for an ailing Earth?

This deep immersion into the miracles of descent and reemergence was focused around the following topics:

  • The Underworld Journey – the myth of Persephone
  • The Time Between Stories – taking stock
  • The Dark Night of the Soul – exploring grief, depression, weariness, burnout
  • The Gifts of the Dark – creative regeneration; exploring the mystery
  • Death and Rebirth – the cycles of life; ritual and ceremony
  • The Return of the Light – navigating the ascent; imagining the year ahead

In this gathering, we prepared both for our descent into the long, dark half of the year, and our ultimate emergence into the light.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”33px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

how it works

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”20px||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our gathering took place via Zoom, in a safe and nurturing space which encourages sharing as well as learning. The session included story, poetry and teachings, and offered prompts to spark your creativity and illumine your journey through life. 

You can purchase the recording of this gathering, for your own use.

After you’ve made your payment (below), you’ll be immediately directed to a ‘Welcome’ page for the gathering, where you’ll find your recording and resources.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ background_color=”#847873″ min_height=”849.4px” custom_margin=”-5px|||||” custom_padding=”69px||69px||true|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16.1″ min_height=”326px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”22px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How TO purchase

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”278px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The fee for this recording is £30. Please follow the link below to make your payment using any credit or debit card. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.)

IMPORTANT: While paying and registering, you will be asked to create a username and password which will allow you to log into the Members’ Area of this website, select ‘Bone Cave’ from the dropdown members’ menu, visit this event’s ‘Welcome’ page, and so access the video and other material. It’s important that you make a note of these details; you won’t be able to access your resources if you do not have them. If you already have an account on this website, please make sure you use the same username and password to ensure you can see all your courses in the same place.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.16.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this event.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
